Dead by Buglight
Dead By Sillymate

9/10 Good game nyess, a wide variety of killers, survivors could be worked on (I know it's meant to be an asymmetric game), at times gameplay could feel repetitive. Overall great, runs smoothly (far more optimized than thr console version) but the latency is just horrifying as there are no dedicated servers (the killer hosts) and after each match you get disbanned from your party.
Melhor experiência!

This game should never have been released (its a great idear game wise, and it could be a lot of fun, if you are able to play the game), I have not been able to play this game continuesly it keeps locking up and crash and wont even start game, I can then uninstall and reinstall game and sometime this "works" so I can play the game for a few mins, but rarely so i can complete even one full game, before the game crashes again, other time the uninstall reinstall does nothing and I have to repeat process until im lucky and can play for a short time.

I can only urge all players to stay well  away from this game, until dervs have fixed the issues and proven that its fixed (I will personally never buy a game from Behaviour digital inc unless they give me full refund for this game, and even then I will be very weary of buying anything from that company (seems they were more worried about getting peoples money than actually having a working product).

News: DC will not get de-ranked, but get tunneled will. 
Just DC if you hate this match! 
Better than that, killers will de-rank if they are too strong and kill too quickly, 
or too weak to do nothing.
Totally 10/10, ruin the killers. Bravo!
It solves everything. Nice job LOL.


============= Existing Issues ===============

1. bad internet quality (usually entering high-ping rooms) 
-> should use public rooms for connection instead of killer's internet
-> connection hanging....
2. manually re-grouping and re-queueing 
-> should implement auto grouping instead of manually re-inviting friends each time
3. numerous existing bugs
-> should fix bugs first before promoting new skins
4. bad survivor experiences
-> should find a way such that the killer cannot keep targeting at one survivor 
-> why not ban face camping/tunneling?
5. should separate PTB and Main Body of the game
-> otherwise each time switch to PTB it needs to re-install
6. Why this game can start with less than 4 survivors? Are you doing things without thinking beforehand?
-> the situation that less than 4 survivors is really easy for killers and uncomfortable for survivors
7. players don't get any rewards from ranking up/high rank
-> DC is the optimal solution when you get bad experiences from this match
8. cheaters 
-> can teleport/locate every survivor immediately
9. new bug
-> keep loading/connecting
good job so far
just another late good game

無料プレイで体験→後購入：

総評：セール中ならアリ。定価で買うものではない。過度な面白さの期待は禁物。一瞬でもストレスを感じたら即座に終了して時間を於いてから後ほどプレイ再会をお勧め。素直にプレイ動画で満足しておけるなら大吉。

良い所：値段相応の面白さと緊張感はある。発売からそれなりに立つが、いまだに定期的なアップデートやDLC、(ゲームレベルの)環境改善の意思が見られる。生存者側でやることをは多くて2つなので、とっつきやすい。

悪い所：マッチングが酷い。そもそもしない。特にキラー。サバイバー側もキラー側も開始0分から勉強努力研鑽上達が必須になるため、私のように趣味の範疇での努力は絶対したくないゲームユーザには、かなり向いていないゲーム。逆に、努力と上達に喜びを見出すタイプのプレイヤーなら、これ以上ないほど向いているゲーム。
チュートリアルの不十分さはゲームオブザイヤーレベル。

中立：サバイバー側からはキラーに何もできないが、その分煽り行動に思考が向きやすいゲームシステム。設定上、ゲーム内の明るさ調節が出来ないため、ゲームの雰囲気作りには一役買っているが、自分がプレイしているものが視認出来ないただのストレスでもある。意図せずして煽りプレイになってしまい、お互いが不快なままゲームが終了することもある。
VCについては打つ手がない。どうしても全滅させたいなら超努力をするか、悟りの心をもって負けを受け入れざるをえない。
Don't believe me? See for yourself.
무한 로딩으로 사람을 지치게 합니다. 진짜 최악 그 자체

tl;dr - With a couple of changes to the game, and if a genie could remove the ~10% of the playerbase causing all of the griefing, DBD would be great.  

The game itself is fresh and innotive, and (mostly) well designed. The game format is difficult to explain, which is probably why it's not in a lot of the reviews, but I'll give it a shot.

There are 4 survivors and 1 killer. The survivor's main objective is to find and repair 5 generators which power electric doors blocking the exit. If the survivors repair 1 more generator than there are living survivors, an escape hatch also appears that can be opened with a key. The hatch automatically opens when there is only one survivor left.

The killer's main objective is to patrol the map to prevent generators from being repaired and to locate/eliminate survivors.

The survivors have a number of tools and strategies to hide from killers, escape when they're found, or to save their teammates from being eliminated. There's no time limit, so it's possible for patient survivors to escape in many situations. On paper, the survivors are favored have at least one person escape, but it takes a long time to get the map knowledge you need to indefinitely evade the killer and it takes very good play and coordination to extract all 4 survivors. In practice, you almost never meet a group of survivors that can all stealth or loop perfectly.

Sounds great, right? It's a really unique and fun format. But there's a few problems that all stem from the assumption that both the killer and survivor are trying to win and end the game. If they wish, survivors can ignore the objectives which makes them very difficult to locate; they can stalemate the game indefinitely. If there's only one survivor left, the killer can block them in a corner and then just go AFK. The game won't end and you can't suicide. I recently played a game where my fellow survivors DCd so early that there was no hatch, and the killer just kept killing me and letting me get back up until I DCd myself.

There's also a non-troll-related situation that comes up a lot, where you have a 1v1 standoff at the escape hatch. The survivor can't enter the hatch because then the killer can 1 shot him. The killer can't swing at him that close to the hatch, because then he can't recover in time to finish the survivor off before he goes through the hatch.

I think both of these problems need addressing. First, they should add a "surrender due to game being taken hostage" button that's monitored for abuse. Basically, you can surrender and take your points and end the game, but you're expected to report whoever was trolling you. If you seem to be surrendering over and over trying to abuse some point grinding scheme, you get banned. Second, a small area around the hatch needs to be a 1 shot kill area, so in the event that the killer and survivor approach the hatch at the same time, the correct survivor play is to commit to jumping through or to turn around and try to juke.

Something that turned me off of this game is people complaining about how "toxic" the players are, but I want to paint an accurate picture of ranks 20-12 here. These are the newb ranks, but I have noticed a big difference in the players I get matched against. Ranks 20-15, there weren't really any trolls, but about 20% of them were subnormal intelligence with bad manners. For example, I have 1 survivor trapped and all 3 other survivors are visibly circling him trying to save him, but in the end game chat I'm a toxic camper fun ruiner for not letting him go out of the kindness of my heart. A lot of players at these ranks get really mad because they don't understand why they're losing.

Around rank 15 I noticed a change. A lot of people that know the game well enough to abuse mechanics but spend their time trolling instead of advancing ranks start showing up here. To be clear, survivors that try hard aren't necessarily trolls, but I mean survivors that intentionally stall the game by not going for objectives and survivors that talk pish in the end chat. This is also where I started to see my first trolling and cheating killers. But this is really probably less than 5% of players.

Игра стала куском дерьма, это мое личное мнение и судя по обзорам не я один так думаю. Dbd появилась в 2015-2016 (не помню точно) тогда эта игра была на пике популярности. Я любил эту игру с 2017 ,но потом все становилось только хуже. После обновление со свиньей игра была нормальная. Потом они стали задерживать обновление с клоуном, это было с января (не помню точно) до июня. И все с этого момента эта игра стала куском говна. Разработчики добавили донатную  валюту (чтобы больше денег хапать, видимо им было мало) потом появился Дух, вроде бы прикольная но потом скучная и разработчики ее опять нерфанули и этот маньяк тоже умер. Потом появился Легион, мне он показался крутым, но слабым. А потом его опять нерфанули и он теперь тоже кусок говна. А потом появилась Чума и эта самый отвратительный маньяк из всех. Ее способность блевать и я не смогу теперь есть перед  компом. Спасибо. У нее противная способность, так она еще жесть какая имбовая. Дальше на PTB выходит Крик. И тут мое мнение разделяется: у него прикольная внешность, прикольный нож, прикольное мементо, но способность худшая и не недоработанная. В общем игра становится все хуже и хуже. Разработчик ее закапывают все глубже и глубже. Ничего эту игру уже не спасет она мертва.

Я просто поражён тем как же разрабы хорошо сделали игру(сарказм). Думали симулятор побега от страшного убийцы? Нет это симулятор вылетов, перезапусков и конечно же бесконечных поисков игроков за убийцу. Вышло значит обновление? Теперь вылеты участились раз в 30 если не больше, это уже рандом либо ты быстро и без вылетов найдёшь игроков и может будет весело(если это не токсик пати) либо подождёшь минут 5 и вылетишь с окном "для доступа к содержимому нужен интернет", ну а может просто после удачной игры ты вылетишь и не получишь тех бп-шек.
Да может кто-то скажет что это я нытик и у всех всё работает, но не у одного меня постоянно вылетает, причём только за убийц, а я собирался по большей части играть за них. Больше ничего кроме этого сказать не могу PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR.

Так же интересно, почему после каждого обновления мне приходится переустанавливать игру? После каждого обновления мне пишет что "файлы были изменены", а разве обновление это не изменение некоторых файлов и добавление новых?

A simple mechanic game with a lot of background knowledge. The background knowledge isn't needed to get into the game, but truly become great at this game you need to know what perks to use with what survivors, how each survivor works and their unique characteristics, what add-ons to use with what item based on whatever offering you choose, and how to work well with other teammates especially while not playing survive with friends. However, you also need to understand it's everyone for themself. If you have the chance to escape or get someone off a hook who's about to die anyways and you've already been hooked, escape. Killers also have their own unique characteristics and you need to understand how to use each killer individually.

Personal favorite survivors:
Meg
Nea

Personal favorite killer:
Huntress

In my experience teaching others how to play this game, I believe the best survivors to start out using are my favorite two, Meg and Nea. And personally, I like Huntress the best because I have a big FPS-gaming background, so her ranged attack comes in very nice!

Kupiona na promocji, świetny wybór dla zaczynających karierę na youtube. Małe wymagania, małe rozmiary plików, super zabawa. 
Gre zaczynamy od wyboru grania jako zabójca, bądź ocalały. Jest też możliwość:
1) grania ze znajomymi jak ocalały
2) grania zabójcą ze znajomymimi ocalałymi (mecze nierankingowe z prostego powodu: znajomi mogą się podkładać i budować nam ranking)

Brak fabuły, można poszukać w internecie zarys historii każdego bohatera.
Prosta zabawa, jako ocalały próbujemy uciec ze strefy; jako zabójca chcemy wyeliminować ocalałych.

Mnóstwo perków które zdobywamy, z czasem grając daną postacią, lub po prostu wydając na nią punkty grając innymi postaciami.
Osobny ranking dla każdej z nich.
Gra typu easy to learn, hard to master.
